markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Evade Doom](/Feats.aspx?ID=2322) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can elude supernatural disaster. When you would gain the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) condition, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you don't gain the doomed condition.

<title level="2">Evade Doom leads to...</title>
[Ten Lives](/Feats.aspx?ID=2329)
name: Evade Doom
